scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && tailwindcss build -i app.css -o dist/assets/styles/app.css -m && gleam export erlang-shipment && mv build/erlang-shipment dist
scripts.dev: tailwindcss build -i app.css -o assets/styles/app.css -m && gleam run
scripts.build:docs: rm -rf docs && gleam docs build && mv build/dev/docs/chess_glm docs
